creator.description:
Subscribe to see labels on all MP posts and profiles for UK MP with their parliamentary roles and committee memberships.

You can also subscribe to @constituencies.mplabeller.uk and @parties.mplabeller.uk.

Data from TheyWorkForYou, updated monthly.
